Item_List.name: Attorney's Badge
Item_List.description: It's my badge. It shows that I am qualified to be a defense attorney. Although I've heared rumors about a defense attorney who had a paper badge, I still put my faith in the justice system.

Item_List.name: Autopsy Report
Item_List.description: The autopsy report by the La Reina County Coroner's office for Joshua Hyland.

Item_List.name: Written Testimony
Item_List.description: A written form of the testimony for Eduardo Fuentes.

Item_List.name: Rubber Gloves
Item_List.description: Rubber gloves found at the crime scene.  Most of the blood splatter seems to be on the right hand. There seems to be a hole where the wrist area is.

Item_List.name: Aluminum Pen
Item_List.description: A tactical pen made from anodized aluminum. A pen Artemis bought as evidence to match a molten one found at the crime scene.
